summary: This adds a vanilla orc hairstyle converted to fit a human male head.
descriptionHtml:
V1.1 - Fixed the "blocky" look of the hair by replacing the original mesh with a new high-poly model.

There's not much to say about this mod. I wanted this hairstyle for my human male character, so I made it. I was pleased with the result, so I decided to share it.

The file contains two versions of orc hair number 16. There is one with stubble, and one without. Happy adventuring!


Thanks to Youtube user Canderes509 for a great tutorial on modding hair.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UVrgw4qqYLQ

Thanks to scanti for The Conformulator.
http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/9360/?

Thanks to throttlekitty for the Skyrim Hair Morph Helper.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6402/?

Thanks to Autodesk for 3ds Max.

Finally, thanks to Bethesda Game Studios for making some of my favorite games of all time.
author: Howitzer155
